attributes.action: reduce the amount of street lighting used throughout this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has now been pretty much universally accepted that a)we're producing too much CO2 and b) if we don't do something, we're toast. We're all told to turn off the lights; why don't the councils? Lights don't automatically make a street safer, but they do need electricity. Let's lose the lights and see the stars again. They don't have a carbon footprint on this planet.
